description: NotesRepository.kt is a Kotlin source file that implements a repository class for managing note objects using SQLite database operations. It provides CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) and search functionalities for notes stored within the application's database.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: Repository class providing CRUD and search operations for notes using SQLite database.

methods.name: getAllNotes
methods.description: Retrieves all notes ordered by last updated timestamp in descending order.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Searches notes whose title or content contain the given query string, case-insensitive.

methods.name: getNote
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by its ID; returns null if not found.

methods.name: insertNote
methods.description: Inserts a new note with a title and content, returning the new note's ID.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by ID with new title and content; returns true if successful.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID; returns true if a note was deleted.

methods.name: mapCursor
methods.description: Maps a Cursor instance to a list of Note objects.

methods.name: readRow
methods.description: Reads a single database row cursor and returns a Note object.
